attributes.action: create a statue or plaque in recognition of Kingston upon Thames' favourite resident, Moses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Moses is believed to be in his forties and has lived in the Kingston upon Thames area all of his life.  For the past twenty years he can be found in the shopping centre wearing brightly coloured clothes or looking rather dapper in top hat and tails.  He is patriotic, never offensive and always has a happy comment to brighten up the day of passers by. It would be great if he could receive a plaque or statue in recognition in Kingston Town Centre.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
